titleStmt.title: Of times and seasons, their mystery by the Lady Eleanor.
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

titleStmt.title: Of times and seasons, their mystery by the Lady Eleanor.
titleStmt.author: Eleanor, Lady, d. 1652.

notesStmt.note: "British Museum Catalogue gives [London] as place of publication"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: lacks all after p. 8; best copy available for photographing. Bound and filmed with D1979 (The bill of excommunication) and D2004 (A prophesie of the last day) following.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
With: The bill of excommunication / the Lady Eleanor. [London? : s.n], 1649 -- A prophesie of the last day / the Lady Eleanor. London printed : [s.n.], 1645.
